changelog.change: · fix copy comment for v345 and above
· update ipa to newer Instagram v352.2

descriptionlist.longdescription:
In App Purchase: $2.99

In App Settings:
· Long press on Instagram text logo to access the tweak settings
· Download Video from posts, IGTV, Reels, etc. (HD | SD)
· Save Images from posts, Stories, & profiles
· Block all promo ads
· Quick seen/unseen Stories/DM's button
· Keep unsent messages
· Copy various text like comments, descriptions, bios, etc.
· Various confirmation prompts on double tap likes
· Lock the app
· And many more settings...


IPA & TrollStore Version?
  • Instructions from here...


    • Refund Policy:
    · Refund accepted if you encounter issues such as safe mode or the tweak not working.
    · Must provide full details about the issue, including photos & crash logs.
    · Change of mind is not accepted; you can see details with photos & videos before buying.
    · If refund is accepted, processing will take 3 to 7 days.
    · Thank you 🤗 & enjoy!


    Subscription | Key & Devices:
    · 1-year subscription (364 days).
    · The key is for 1 device and is transferable.


    Refer to the FAQ page for more info:
  • FAQ page
